name: Thunder and Eternity
description:
Convert all your Elemental Dice to the Type of the active character.
(You must have at least 2 Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: Convert all your Elemental Dice to the Type of the active character.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3403}Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: Convert all your Elemental Dice to the Type of the active character.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3403}Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: "It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"
